website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that can fit up to 4 meals and has enough room to accommodate 2 bottles.
pros: Compact sizing without compromising available space
The bag is made with extra thick fabric for protection against wear and tear
Comes with 3 meal prep containers and a large ice pack to help insulate food
Extra pockets offer even more storage space for snacks or supplements
cons: The zipper sometimes gets stuck, and the bag is available in limited colors

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality handle attachment
customer_reviews.text: One of the loops where the handle is affixed started becoming loose about 2 months into using the bag. This morning it finally gave way and tore. From my observation the loop is not properly stitched and the thread became loose. The loop is the least complicated part of the bag construction and should not have failed so quickly. I can no longer carry the bag by the handle and will have to purchase another bag. The bag is versatile but I would not purchase another of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dobby Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect , not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Peregrct size and not bulky. I meal prep and it nicely carries my 3 day time meals and even my 1/2 gallon water jug. I read some reviews if it’s breaking and containers don’t fit you’re probably jamming you large Tupperware in it and it’s not designed for that. The containers it comes with are great. I already have a cabinet of the same iso containsers so it’s a perfect fit. Glad i didn’t spend more when i didn’t need to.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Hilton

customer_reviews.title: MEAL PREPPERS
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! I debated back and forth between bags I had seen for meal prepping and this one. I am SO glad I saved money by buying this awesome bag. The compartments are great and I also purchased extra containers (three compartment containers) that fit in here
customer_reviews.author: JDMReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one bag for breast pumping mamas!
customer_reviews.text: This is for all you mamas who pump at work or on the go. This cooler allows me to put the pump itself in the main compartment, four 4oz medela storage bottles AND a big thick ice pack in the side compartment, and my pump parts and a small ice pack in the top compartment. It also fits my hands-free bra and car converter in the mesh pouches. I like that I can fit everything in one bag, and I can temperature control the compartments individually. It's well made and has kept the ice packs frozen in a 73ish degree room for 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gina V.

customer_reviews.title: customer satisfaction update!
customer_reviews.text: I usually only have two of the three trays in the bag and one 16oz water bottle. I was feeling good about the purchase until I utilized the short handle a total of 4-5 times and it started to give. I’ll do a review on my YouTube channel on my thoughts after reaching out to the seller. The seller responded to my review, with action. Not talk. They showed that they pride their customers and product. They issued me a brand new bag with no hassle. I will be doing a review on my YouTube channel, “That Guy Health” and showing off the reasons why I enjoy this meal bag and the customer service! 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stitching on the carry handle is coming apart after ...
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the carry handle is coming apart after using it twice. I don’t even ever use the carry handle, I use the shoulder strap so there is no reason it should be coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Watson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one for sure!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my job doesn’t have a good refrigerator, and I like to pack cooked food. I was going to get the well known expenses brand but decided to get a less expensive one. I bought this one after reading several reviews. I love it entirely. The strap is adjustable. There is so much room if you want to pack three meals you could with the containers included. The containers are plastic but good quality and dishwasher safe. The water bottle section has me sold and there are like three extra compartments.
customer_reviews.author: saundra

customer_reviews.title: Well built with tons of room
customer_reviews.text: Stores enough food for the whole day. Extra pockets for silverware, napkins, etc. Big 2x drink holder that doubles as salad dressing pocket. Decent zippers that don't snag when using. Durable, no problems inside or out on seams or fabric. Shoulder strap can get ultra long. It's not ultra massive, still fits in the fridge. Most importantly, the containers are very good with tight lids. I can't think of a single con. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: S. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag, perfect price
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenient when planning my meals. The insulation factor of the bag meets or exceeds what I feel is necessary. I'm not sure if the containers are microwaveable but I put hot food in them and they didn't become malleable at all. Plus they clean up easily in the dishwasher. I'm glad I chose this one as my first meal prep bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best lunch bag/meal prep bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s been about 2 years now this bag has been good to me. I work around dirt and this bag hasn’t really collected any dust, the material it’s made of makes it easy to clean. Great size as well I wouldn’t want anything bigger or smaller the ONLY thing I can complain about it I wish the walls were stronger only because I’d you put something heavy in the top or sides it might slouch to a side, not a big deal but it would be perfect if it had that, some wall support. Also it’s really nice and quality you can take it on trips or something, can hold all your meals plus car keys, wallet, travel stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great for Packing Multiple Meals
customer_reviews.text: This is great for packing multiple meals. I bought it to bring breakfast and lunch on 12-hour shifts and this thing fits everything. The compartment for beverages on the side is the absolute best part. I can make a smoothie and throw it in there with a small icepack and not have to worry. The lunch box/bag also comes with two different strap lengths which makes it easy to carry over my shoulder when my hands are full. So many compartments for all types of food. Plus it comes with an ice pack and food containers as a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: natalie.b.

customer_reviews.title: making it useless. I really only bought this bag because of ...
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, the shoulder strap was missing some components, making it useless. I really only bought this bag because of the shoulder strap. But I thought it would be okay because of the smaller handle strap. However, the little part at the end that connects into the bag wasn't working either because it would not open to snap into the bag's loop for it. So the straps came either incomplete or broken. Also the zippers get stuck often and make it hard to open and close the product. It did come with some meal prep containers so that's good but I wish I never bought this in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of food
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunchbox! It holds a TON of food, but I tend to work long hours, so I'm glad I can pack breakfast, lunch, and snacks without running out of space. The drink compartment is awesome--I can usually fit a breakfast shake and a bottle of protein water plus some ice packs in it with no problem. The only thing I don't like about it is that sometimes the straps feel flimsy... they've never broken on me or anything, but for some reason they just feel like they aren't as secure as they could be sometimes. But, despite that, I'd definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! My only and I mean only complaint is that the strap easily disengages sometimes. It's NEVER done it while carrying it just moving it around at home (and not even worth me taking a star off for). I take this to work every day! The bottle section is the absolute best thing ever!! I take OJ and milk to work with me every day and both bottles fit perfectly in this bag!!! This would even be perfect for an outing to a ball park to save some money and NOT buying the stadium food! Pack this full of healthy and delicious snacks and food for the entire game!
customer_reviews.author: Angela A. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for meal prep bags for quite some time and this is the perfect size and an amazing price! I can fit more than 3 meals in this guy for sure! The best part is the spot on the side for shaker bottles. There's so many compartments for pretty much anything you can think of and the color is so pretty! I'm a girl, I want my bag to be pretty too. Definitely recommend this for anyone doing meal prep or carting around those rectangular containers/blender bottles/fruit/protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancé since she needed a more effective way to carry around her daily meals as plastic grocery bags weren’t cutting it anymore. Needless to say, she loves it. She carries 3 meals with her in the main compartment, protein powder, shakers, extra snacks as well as a food scale. Even with all that there’s still room to fit more! It definitely beats running to your local supplement shop and spending $100 on a lesser quality product. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend and she loved it. It was really great and beautiful. The functionality of it is great. I loved the whole design. The color is perfect. I added extra food containers because it is needed when you meal prep a lot and don't want to wash the few containers you have. The containers are very durable and easy to use. I really love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Sara LeAnn Terry

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: The lunch bag is large but does not hold as much as I thought it would. It does not hold its shape (its soft all around) and I HATE the containers it came with. They leak. Then, the liquid leaks out of the bottom of the bag onto whatever surface the lunch bag is placed on. So, I purchased different containers that do not leak and the outside bottom of the bag still gets wet from condensation from the reuseable ice pack inside. At least that is water and not food sauces. But it is definitely not leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Surdow

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase. No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I spent way too much time deciding on a lunchbox. But I am very happy with my purchase. I can fit a sandwich, a small salad, and two of the trays in the main compartment. I put things like chips in the trays to prevent getting crushed. I have fit multiple ice packs in the cooler, even with all 3 trays. The outside drink pouch is easily big enough for multiple bottles of water. I've been using it daily for a couple of months and it still looks brand new. Definitely pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for your meal. I have no problem with any part of it. I can put three bottles of water in the drink area. I put all three food containers plus I have room for my two small containers which have sauces in them and one or two ice packs as well in the food area. It keeps everything cold. I have enough room on top for my fruit and other stuff. This is a very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Thani

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: The bag was great at first -cute color, compact yet held all my food with no issues. It keeps everything cold but now when the ice pack starts to thaw out, it leaks thru the bottom of the bag. The zippers are super cheaply made and you have to be super careful when opening or closing . If the co. can fix these issues it would be a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP AND THIN - Tupperware won't fit
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP AND SMALLER THAN IT LOOKS! The main compartment will not accommodate average sized Tupperware containers. The zippers are thin and cheap feeling. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: EDC Meal Prep Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, everything fits in its own compartment. We took it to a doctor's appointment out of town and we were there about six hours, the food we brought back was still cold when we returned. I recommend this to anyone who has to take food with them like for all day doctors appointments, ect saves a lot of money. We are using the 21 Day Fix Portion eating plan and this is ideal for that. I would buy this bag again, or purchase as a gift for someone who has to back a lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotahbear

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The containers are much more sturdier than I thought. They haven't gotten bent anywhere, considering how often I have used them in the microwave. I definitely have gotten my money's worth so far since I work 12 hour shifts, and I can literally fit my breakfast, lunch, and snacks in there without having to stuff things in the bag in order for it to close.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Beltran

customer_reviews.title: One year in, want to buy more containers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product last July. Have used The containers for meal prep and the bag for lunch to work daily since then! I’ve only had one clasp snap on me and that was because I didn’t have the cover lined up with the container and forced it on. I believe that that’s why most people crack them off. Regardless I’m happy with the durability and how long they’ve lasted me. That being said, Is there any way to purchase any more of the containers them selves I saw another style but I like the ones with the snap on cover.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I have looked into purchasing other meal prep bags and they never were quite what I needed. Usually they were just too big, but the smaller ones didnt have enough compartments. This guy is perfect for me. My favorite parts are the top compartment and the drink compartment. I also love the option for a longer strap or shorter strap!
customer_reviews.author: kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I love this meal prep bag!! There's enough room to pack food for a 12-14 hour work day. The containers are great for portion control and there's a compartment for drinks on the side. I love that there is a handle and a shoulder strap for easy transport. Inside the top flap there's an area for utensils/napkins and a side pocket on the side of the bag. Great find! Not too big and not to small....Just right for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2shopping

customer_reviews.title: This one is perfect! Has plenty of space and the containers are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who works out and away from restaurants. So he had to have a lunchbox that could sustain him while working from early morning to late at night. This one is perfect! Has plenty of space and the containers are large enough to place meat/vegetables/sandwich/chips or fruit in them! Love the double bottle holder and space for silverware and napkins! Glad I found this one! It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Pocamo50

customer_reviews.title: Meal Prep bag
customer_reviews.text: I have received the meal prep bag. I have not used it, yet. It appears to be well built. I work 12 hour+ shifts and this bag definitely gives me room for all that I need. I like the separate compartments and can finally add a premade protein shake and not worry about powder exploding all over everything. I,also, like the compact size of this bag. Co-workers use similar, extremely more expensive, meal management systems and they are huge! (Makes the other systems inconvenient to carry.) I am hoping that this bag is able to keep food cool for a lengthy amount of time. I will use it soon and write an update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're a meal prepper!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! I meal prep weekly and usually have 2-3 containers to bring to work with me each day. Having this bag has made it so easy for me to grab my stuff and go each morning. I love having the ice pack compartment, and it works great to keep things chilled, in both the drink compartment and the meal prep container compartment. I also got the containers to go with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Storebo

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag a lot. My favorite parts are how tall it is to fit my full size shaker cups, the storage on the top, and the color. It only comes with 3 containers so buying extra containers is definitely essential. The top part has a lot of storage which I really like. The one compliant I have about this bag is that it only has the zip on the side to access the large portion of the bag. Some of the other bags have the option of zipping along the top to allow for easier access to place and remove your containers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The bag serves its purpose but I don't think it's particularly good quality. The clips for the strap are cheap and I'm not sure will last very long. I also ordered this specific product because I had a 10% discount coupon, but it turns out the coupon didn't actually work so I feel like that was a bait and switch as my friend had the same issue after we both ordered meal prep containers from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Ms J

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything like a mysterious clown car!
customer_reviews.text: This is very spacious for meal prepping and if you carry sauce or drinks and also the top compartment is very nice and can fit all of my protein bars and tuna I could possibly need in a lifetime. The only drawback from my 6 pack lunch box is it doesn't exactly stand on its own after you take your food out of the front compartment the whole lunch box seems to smush down into itself, which kind of sucks. All in all though very affordable and worth it
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived on time and with all accessories listed in description. Pros: Keeps food cold. Top compartment is great for storing little snacks like protein bars, fruit, and even another little meal in a small Tupperware container. Side sleeves are great for storing protein powder, phones, and other little snacks. Yes, back storage where the blender bottles go can fit two blender bottles. Overall a great product for only $29.99, when I bought it. I believe it is $34.77 now and I would have no problem paying that price. If you're looking for a beginner/intermediate meal prep bag, this bag is definitely for you.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Cano

customer_reviews.title: Great for all-day food prep
customer_reviews.text: This meal bag is awesome. I bought it for my husband and he loves it. He says it's a little clunky, but I think it's perfect. There is a place for everything and he doesn't have to juggle coffee/water/lunch/snacks when leaving for work. I would probably buy another one if it was the same, but only had 2 containers that were shorter, but deeper, making the overall product smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Is a great product with lots of room to store your lunch. I love the zipper pocket that allows you to slide in your leftovers and protects them in a way that they don’t spill all over the inside of the lunch bag. I would highly recommend this lunch bag. Only downside is its a little big to tote around.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: I love it because its cheap and it gets the job ...
customer_reviews.text: ive been using this for almost two years. I love it because its cheap and it gets the job done but its really top heavy if you have anything in the top compartment and falls over if you have one container in the bottom. it never stands up straight and the handle is always in the way. I like it enough to use it but i wouldnt purchase again or purchase as a gift. there are better options
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my husband as a gift. He likes it a lot and uses it daily to carry his meals with him. The bag seems to be high quality and works well. It has additional pockets and stores three containers. The only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is because the containers this comes with do not stack inside of each other so when not in use, the storage becomes very bulky and takes up a lot of space since they don’t stack. Ofherwise, this is the perfect alternative to the more expensive brands out there!
customer_reviews.author: Kseniya Ostrovska

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag; Perfect for a new meal prepper!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I anticipated. Perfect size and holds everything that I need for the day, including my water & blender bottle. The only thing I didn't really care for was the ice pack that comes with it. It does it's job but it's takes up more space than what I care for so, I ended up purchasing a set of those thin ice packs and put them in between the containers and behind my drinks......perfection!
customer_reviews.author: L. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Fun unique color and good for days when I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun unique color and good for days when I don't need to carry my full 6-meals. I use this lunch bag also when I am not in prep. The many compartments make it very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D.

customer_reviews.title: Older style was better.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying this bag and a lot has changed since. 1st the pros. It now comes with a better plastic reusable freezer thing to keep your meals cold instead of the bag kind. Seems a little bigger too. Cons. Mines didn’t come with a removal shoulder strap or removable carry handle like the old old. Both were missing completely and only has a sown on handle that I’m 100% sure is going to rip off within 3 months. Overall decent bag. They changed the meal prep containers too but nothing to much about those to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Mike. B

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money! Don't keep looking buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately someone took our first bag, so this is our second time ordering. This lunch bag is well worth the money spent. Surprisingly roomy and keeps food cool for a good portion of the day. The design is mature as well.
customer_reviews.author: Latesa

customer_reviews.title: I will probably keep this thing forever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this over a year ago, and have been using it for work, and everything it came with is still in perfect condition! I love that with just an ice pack (1 per section), it will keep everything cold the whole 20-minute bike ride to work, even in the summer! Before I got the extra ice packs, I kept the whole bag in a deep freezer overnight and it held it's cool well enough to keep my TV dinners frozen. It's the perfect size to strap down to the back of my bike with just a couple of bungee cords.
customer_reviews.author: Sabbath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for meal preppers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas to replace another basic cooler he loved and had used for years. Now that he has the EDC Meal Prep Bag, I don't think he even remembers his old bag! :) He loves that the EDC Bag holds his breakfast, lunch and snack meals that he takes to work in three separate meal containers along with his protein and workout shakes in the side compartment. It keeps his food cold and has additional space for non-perishables like his supplements, wallet, ID badge, etc. Would definitely purchase again and am thinking of getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon G.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for meal preppers!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I was skeptical on this bag but I pack it heavy and it does very well. I am super happy with my purchase! The Tupperware are also very nice. I don’t like how they don’t slide into one another when being stacked, but that’s just because of the type they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk and purchased it. The bag started leaking after only a month of use. It seems that iit's also too late for me to return the thing. So I'm out almost 30 bucks.s (to add insult too injury, the price has been reduced on the item in the meantime)
customer_reviews.author: Swamptribe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing Is exactly what i needed. I gave 4 stars because of 2 small issues. The material is pretty pliable which isn't really an issue if you always have 3 containers in it. Also the zippers are down towards the middle which creates a pivot point and makes it top heavy once you have empty containers in it. Other than that it's great! Zippers work well, handle and strap are nice, and it holds plenty to get me through a 10 hour work day, and I eat a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread Turkey

customer_reviews.title: Lunch
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I was worried about the plastic things breaking but they don't break easy. It didn't come with a ice pack. This thing is a very decent size. It's all insulated. It has two different handles on each side. It also has pockets on each side.Can't wait to use it at school.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the versatility of this lunch or meal prep bag. I've had it for about a year now and it's still holding up. Sometimes I just use 1 or 2 of the containers and then load it with fruit. I keep pens and supplements in the other compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Meal Prep Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for meal prepping. Everything is as described and it seems sturdy, like it will last a long time. One of the best features is the side pocket that holds two shaker bottles...so helpful! I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: This lunch box is amazing! It is perfect for my husband who is ...
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box is amazing! It is perfect for my husband who is a teacher and spend the entire day at school. He loves all the compartments and space for two water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hattan

customer_reviews.title: Way Cool
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this thing. The containers are nice and sturdy. Not the flimsy crap I've had to deal with in the past. It's tall and narrow, so it carries easier and doesn't feel like a hefty duffel or anything. Plenty of pockets to organize stuff with. Overall, really happy with this and totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: zane

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed ! Was looking for a meal prep bag and that’s exaclty what I got. Really spacious. The 2 straps come in handy. One long and one short. I would’ve given this 5 stars but everyday use is starting to take a toll on the straps. The shorter strap is starting to rip off. Fortuanlty I like the bag enough I might sew it bag or lose the strap. I use the longer strap mostly anyway, which thankfully is fully intact. Worth the buy. I even fit other size containers in the top and middle compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Ammanda

customer_reviews.title: So far so good- holds more than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty well built. I can Fit 3 containers in the main section, one in the top and one in the vertical section, so in reality I can set for 5/6 of my daily meals. I throw The ice pack in the side compartment and another in the mesh pocket on the other side and everything in the main compartment stays quite cold for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Rwash

customer_reviews.title: Quality feel!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it is made well. I was very happy with the overall size. I like how the ice pack on this bag sit to the side and cover all the containers. I bought the 3 meal with the intent to use 2 meal boxes and replace the third with water bottles as I often work in high heat. I use the drink pocket to carry nutrition supplements for hydration and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to take to work. I really like the containers, they have not leaked and the lids are easy to put on. Lots of compartments for food and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad to finally have a bag where I can secure ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad to finally have a bag where I can secure and zip up my protein shaker bottles instead having exposed for the whole world to see. Also appreciate that the bag behaves more like NYC. Food storage is vertical and to the side thus occupying less desk space. This would have been a perfect 5 if the top compartment of the bag allowed you to slow heat food like the mini hot logic does or if it could accommodate one. Then all my meal prep needs could be met when I'm out and about. But that being said, it's one of the better bags out there.
customer_reviews.author: FutrRD

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Received item very quickly with everything as shown. Love the style, size, and comfort of the bag. Meets all my needs and has the right amount of pockets. The reason why I am rating 4 stars is because the stitching in the front pocket where the meals go in ripped after a couple days of use and was completely opened. I'm not very good at stitching so I krazy glued it and now looks horrible. Would recommend to have better stitching and material.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Flores

customer_reviews.title: The size is great. The shoulder strap is good but the other ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is great. The shoulder strap is good but the other handle is no use, is always get caught under the bag. The bag does not keep the food cold for really long. The idea is great but need some design improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a week but seller was super responsive!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review last week about the handle ripping during the first week of having the lunchbag and seller contacted me and was able to process a full refund. He/she was very cooperative and friendly to make sure I was very satisfied with my experience. Overall I still love the lunchbox. Still has a over the shoulder strap that works perfectly and plenty of space to fit my 2 meals plus 2 snacks and a shaker bottle. The bag is a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Was pleased to receive my bag a day early which was ...
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased to receive my bag a day early which was awesome. Received bag on Sat Nov 4, used it Monday and Tuesday and on Wednesday realized the handle was already tearing away from the bag and I was no longer able to use that handle and had to use the shoulder strap. Will fix on my own so it will be more sturdy since returning is a hassle. Have till January to return bag if anything else go amuck I certainly will. Bag is a bit large and I have yet to use all 3 containers or the side drink holder. Seems to keep everything cold though. Overall pleased but disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: gjmcneil2000

customer_reviews.title: Good lunchbox.
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily in a fairly rough environment and it works well. I did invest in better freezing packs though.
customer_reviews.author: GTT

customer_reviews.title: I love my bag
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag, it's perfect for my meal prep, and works great with my hectic schedule. I'm able to workout and keep my busy work schedule and eat healthy in the process. This bag is perfect for those who plan on eating healthy and who meal prep while keeping up with life's daily demands and keeping the body well nourished. The bag holds three meals, plenty of snacks and two water bottles, my bad stays cool the entire day. I love it!! I recommend the EDC Mean Prep bag, it really is a great high quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Valencia

customer_reviews.title: The meal prep containers are nothing special but they are a great size for food
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter who is a police officer and preps her meals everyday. She loves this bag and all the compartments to store her food and shake containers. The meal prep containers are nothing special but they are a great size for food. highly recommend this bag for all meal preppers!
customer_reviews.author: Ann cuhaj

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, sturdy, not too big, not too small
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lunchbox for some time now, and I have to admit I'm still pretty excited about it. It fits everything I need for a 12 hour shift, plus it has room for me to bring drinks. I can't think of a single bad thing to say about this bag. And the color is just as pretty in real life as it is in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Breeden

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome. I have been looking for a meal management ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. I have been looking for a meal management bag to keep my containers flat and stable that isn't too big. It's the perfect size, maybe a little large, but it fits everything that I need, nothing I don't. I wish it came in other colors, but this is the most affordable meal bag that I found and it's incredibly practical and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but handle seems weak
customer_reviews.text: Thing is great. Keeps foods cold, can hold 3 meals. I also use the Rubbermaid larger rectangle roundish Tupperware and it fits nice. Only problem I have is the handle is tearing away and probably won’t last much longer. Now I have to use the shoulder harness, which isn’t bad but wish I still had the option. Maybe it couldn’t handle the weight of 3 meals and two shaker bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: WHERE HAS THIS BEEN ALL MY LIFE???
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this product is definitely worthy of a few nods! I LOVE LOVE LOVE it!! Has just enough storage for all the food I need to eat at work. I fill all three containers, plus pack tea bags, snack bars, a fruit, utensils, and napkins. I typically keep a 25oz shake cup in one pocket, with room to store a second, or I'll pack salad dressing. If I had to think of a con, it would be that the side zippered compartment gets caught on the strap. Totally not a big deal at all! I'd highly recommend this to everyone that is ready to be prepared for a delicious day!
customer_reviews.author: AbremlinKnows

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it will hold all types of plastic lunch trays. I wish the top pocket was a little deeper but it’s well built, durable and reliable. No rips and tears but anything will begin to break down if you treat it poorly.
customer_reviews.author: M.Cruz

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The 3 trays you get scratches easily and the black plastic starts to peel. I think it's a little to small.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Company, Great Product, Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fit everything I needed for a full 12 hour day. Containers are the right size per portion. The top container is very useful, as is the side container for the shaker bottle (or two). I take it with me everyday. The huge added bonus is that you can fit enough stuff in this thing to not spend money during your day. I get plenty of questions about it at work, and happily show it off. The customer service is great, they personally thank you and ask you if you need anything after your purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Dag

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this forever ago and you couldnt even tell! My favorite part is bringing it to work i can fit literally everything in it. My food, headphones, water, lotion, keys, chapstick, etc
customer_reviews.author: desirae

customer_reviews.title: Excellence in the form of a bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. As a personal trainer with two other part time jobs its hard to keep up with my meals. This bag is perfect for those that need something compact that can fit in your locker or duffel bag. I Fit everything in my bag, four meals, two snacks, all of my aminos, glutamine, vitamins, utensils Everything I need for the day can be put into this bag. Everybody in my Jiu Jitsu class loved the concept. I will probably be making a video review for this bag in the next week or so. .-Joe Douglas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This prep bag looks cool and all but Ive had enough time write a ...
customer_reviews.text: This prep bag looks cool and all but Ive had enough time write a review about the product and not happy with it. The bag is bulky and it seems as it was made longer from one side of the bag so the bag always tilts to one side. The handle from it always makes the bag flip over. Its just not worth the money. I gave it 3 starts for effort and material is good but would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Consider buying
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall to this product is that it stains quickly , I’m not sure if I can pop it in the washer and I’m not willing to test it because I’m afraid I’ll tear the net that’s on the side . But other than that it’s super useful! I don’t use the Tupperware because it’s hella cheap and doesn’t work well in the microwave but the lunch bag is big enough to fit my whole breakfast and lunch meals .
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service
customer_reviews.text: Love this meal prep bag!! The owner messaged me shortly after I received it to inform me of a math calculation to find out how many calories I need to consume to either lose, maintain, or gain weight. I have never had this type of customer service with any other fitness brand. Excellent job and product!
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag! I can fit 3 meals comfortably with snacks for my long days out with school and work. The ice pack included does exactly what it should. And being able to keep my shaker cup in the bag as well is an extra. It was a bit bulky at first but I quickly adjusted to it. And a zipper was a bit stuck at first but after a couple days of using it, it unstuck itself. Bought some more containers through the company to meal prep ahead of time. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Will R.

customer_reviews.title: Great meal prep bag that’s affordable !
customer_reviews.text: Flew 11 hours to Japan with this bag. It kept my meal prep cold for a long time! It’s well designed, i like the pockets on the side and the insulated bottle holder area. I can fit a total of 4 meals in it (3 in the main compartment, 1 up top). I almost bought an isoprep bag for $70, I’m so glad I got this one instead! Much more affordable and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for almost three years use it for 3-5 times a week. Stuff it into drawers, packed fridges at work, tosses around in the back of my truck and still in perfect condition. Only thing if you want food to last longer than 8 hours I would suggest putting a second freezer pack in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can fit much more in this bag than my old lunch bag and it is of sturdy quality. The only thing I'd really change
customer_reviews.text: This meal prep bag hits my marks in most respects. I can fit much more in this bag than my old lunch bag and it is of sturdy quality. The only thing I'd really change, is I'd like the side zipper to not be arched, but rather, square. I use a variety of meal prep containers, some a smidge wider than the ones with come with the bag and sometimes it can be a bit difficult to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jitz

customer_reviews.title: Terrific lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Terrific lunch box! I am trying to watch my diet, and eat healthier. Work two 10 hour days each week, and found it hard to stay on track with my healthy eating. Now i can prepare all my meals for the day, have a place for drinks and snacks. Been using it regularly, even when i have a day of running around doing errands. No more drive thru food. Everything is with me when i need it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C

customer_reviews.title: solid lunch bag for food prepping or your avg lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking into the "six pack bag" but thought they were too bulky. This fits in my motorcycle saddle bag, and has been durable so far. I don't use the containers that comes with it, I purchased heavier glass containers to use and the bag doesn't care much about the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Pruchniewski

customer_reviews.title: Chip containers and no icing box.
customer_reviews.text: The ice box is not as pictured - it comes with a flabby bag that does not fit anywhere. The containers are not as pictures - no fold down snaps like the ones in the picture, just thin and chip barely locking plastic containers and tops.
customer_reviews.author: Armen Margarian

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It has ample storage and lots of room for different meal containers and shaker bottles. Great bag and cute color
customer_reviews.author: jenw

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but not the best material.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag yesterday, & it was delivered to me already with the smaller handle damaged/torn. It’s a fix I can handle myself, but it’s a fix I shouldn’t have to handle in the first place. Besides that, it’s a great lunch bag. It’s not too big or bulky, it has room for my meal(s) and snacks; it also keeps the drinks cold. The added ice pack & containers are great too. Clearly it just needs to be made with a better material.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Loubriel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag overall, but...
customer_reviews.text: This bag has made staying organized while working very simple. I drive for work all day, and I can conveniently store both my food/drinks and tools/misc items with ease. My only complaint about the bag is the handle sewn on top of the bag is rather cheap, and after 2 months of moderate use it is a few threads from coming off completely at one end.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Poorly thought out shoulder comfort
customer_reviews.text: Decent lunch bag , nice containers so far, poorly thought out on shoulder strap should have padded piece that hits top of shoulder when you got big lunch packed it is uncomfortable to carry
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great, but 2 things
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but after a week of use, the handle strap frayed, unraveled, and came apart leaving the hook hanging. Luckily, they send you two straps (shoulder and handle), but I prefer the handle, which I can no longer use. Other issue is where the hook is places on the meal compartment. So odd, gets in the way of easily opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag came in perfect condition just as package description
customer_reviews.text: Bag came in perfect condition just as package description. I have used it all week and love that the containers stack along with a ice pack in the large section. I typically take a LaCroix for my drink at lunch so that goes in the back pocket with a small ice pack. I don't use the fridge at work but this bag keeps my food cold until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy schneider

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder lunchbox organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch organizer to go. Light and compact,easy to clean containers,few extra pockets,good quality made overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for food prep
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this bag for the exception of the side bags the mash rips off pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag everyday! Good durability and size. The bag is perfect for a Couple meals with space for snacks. The side pocket holds a 40oz hydro flask and extras like phone charger etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I have recommended it to various people already. It keeps food cold for a while. I did however buy some additional cold packs. I would recommend doing the same.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: The meal prep containers that come with this amazing lunch bag are perfect. I am not one that eats during the day but this has changed that for the better! It even makes my co-workers want to start eating better! I have sent the link to this bag to at least 5 people and more are asking for it! I love this bag
customer_reviews.author: Laura McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Strap metal piece popped off
customer_reviews.text: Day one and strap has already snapped... I am still not sure about the rest of the grades..... I just hope I can either get my money back or a new one. Well they got me the strap but the fact that it stained fast, wasn't cool at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yelizaveta

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with getting the wrong containers and ice pack than what was shown in the photos. I contacted the company and they took care of the issue promptly. I very much like the bag its perfect for meal planing and prep so I always have my food at work. Very good product I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David Telesco

customer_reviews.title: Ice pack leaked gel and Food containers not microwaveable
customer_reviews.text: I and my son received this insulated lunch kit for Christmas 2019 and both of our blue ice packs leaked the blue gel after about 3 months of use. I dislike the fact that the food storage containers aren’t microwaveable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse & Teresa

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love the size of this lunchbox because we work together ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love the size of this lunchbox because we work together everyday so we can pack our meals in one space, but disappointed because the handle strap is already ripping and eventually we won’t be able to carry it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: marco a romero

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: only had the bag a month and the strap broke off
customer_reviews.author: Steven Longanbach

customer_reviews.title: What I like best are the food containers and the the bag
customer_reviews.text: What I like best are the food containers and the the bag. Although you have to seat the lid just right to get it to lock down when you do it's sealed tight and leak proof. What I like least is the ice pack doesn't seem to last very long, but it is a very nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S.

product_meta.title: Evolutionize Meal Prep Insulated Lunch Bag Cooler Bag Patented Lunch Box includes Portion Control Meal Prep Containers and Ice Pack (3 Meal, Black)
feature_bullets: FULL SIZE, ULTRA VERSATILE  - EDC Meal Prep Bag comes with 3 full sized meal prep containers, and one large non-toxic gel pack. Meal Prep Lunch Box has separately insulated top compartment that fits an optional 4th container, or other food items, at a separately controlled temperature.

COMPACT DESIGN + HIGH STORAGE - When designing the EDC cooler bag we felt other bags were either too bulky or were just too small. For that reason we built from scratch the high capacity yet sleek design you see today. The end result is a highly versatile meal management solution that insulates up to 4 meals, 2 protein shaker cups, and outer mesh pocket and one outer private pocket for everything else.

PREMIUM HEAVY DUTY MATERIALS - Diet success doesn’t come from taking days off, so we built this bag to survive the daily grind. Super thick PEVA inner lining, EPA foam, metal hardware, YKK zippers, ultra strong mesh all wrapped in a thick ultra-strong polyester.

3X INSULATED COMPARTMENTS - Versatility and flexibility should be key for any lunch box solution. Three independently accessible compartment systems allow you to organize your meals, supplements, proteins, shakers, fruits, and utensils. Side pocket are perfect for keeping water bottles, fruit, shaker cups. Top compartment is great for snacks, nuts, berries, supplements, or just a fourth container of food.

5 STAR EXPERIENCE GUARANTEE - We’re very confident you’ll absolutely love your EDC Meal Prep Bag - or any our other products! If somehow you aren’t 100% satisfied, just contact us! We are happy to help!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,345 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
